label: Auctions and Antique Sales
description: Market category for auctions and sales of antiques, collectibles, and other valuable items.
intents: Buy and sell antiques and collectibles

subcategories.label: Furniture Auctions
subcategories.description: Auctions and sales of antique and modern furniture.

subcategories.label: Jewelry and Watch Auctions
subcategories.description: Auctions and sales of antique and modern jewelry and watches.

subcategories.label: Stamp and Coin Auctions
subcategories.description: Auctions and sales of rare and collectible stamps and coins.

subcategories.label: Art and Memorabilia Auctions
subcategories.description: Auctions and sales of fine art, collectible memorabilia, and other valuable items.

subcategories.label: General Auctions
subcategories.description: Auctions and sales of a wide variety of items, including household goods, tools, and electronics.
